pageContext.claim: “And then it gets released today that [Biden] was a big unmasker. So how do you know nothing if you're one of the unmaskers? It's one of the very big stories, and I suspect you'll have, if it's possible, even bigger stories coming out.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often attempts to spin the unmasking of Flynn into something more nefarious than it was. Unmasking requests are made dozens if not hundreds of times per year. Biden was one of thirty national security officials who asked for the identity of the person with whom the Russian ambassador spoke. Flynn was not being spied on but the people that he spoke to were.
